text: <@UBT0AHWLD> can you call a macro from a rich text inside a module? I've never tried that

So… if this is a smaller set of items, it might be more efficient to load all of them using hubl, and adding classes to them to help you segment them, hide and show based upon selection. You wouldn't need multiple api calls to filter products.
I'm the header module it is likely overriding the settings and you'll need to go modify that maybe
Yeah that might be a better way to do it!
if you have all products displayed, that might help out seo for that page — not sure what it is used for, but if you are trying to generate organic traffic, that could help

Could someone help me figure out how to have this image as a title image on a landing page I am working on that will fit across the screen right under the website header  and scale between mobile and desktop?

I am currently using a workaround to demonstrate what I am trying to do but as I had to turn off scale to fit it only works for desktop.
